hero.title: Bring Your Characters to Life, Instantly
hero.description: From text to motion. Describe an action, and our AI will generate a production-ready 3D animation.

outputPipeline.title: Output Formats & Pipeline Integration
outputPipeline.description: Export motions in industry-standard formats and drop them directly into your 3D or game production workflow — no extra cleanup required.

items.title: Production-Ready Export Formats
items.description: Download motion data as FBX, BVH, or GLTF. Files are clean, lightweight, and compatible with major DCC and game-engine pipelines.

items.title: Unity & Unreal Engine Friendly
items.description: Animations import smoothly into Unity Humanoid and UE5 Mannequin rigs, making them ready for prototyping, cutscenes, or gameplay animation.

items.title: Retarget-Ready Neutral Skeleton
items.description: Motions are generated on a neutral skeleton designed for easy retargeting, so you can map them to your own characters with minimal effort.

items.title: Blender & DCC Tool Support
items.description: Seamlessly open and edit motions in Blender, Maya, and other animation tools to fine-tune keyframes or blend multiple actions.

items.title: Future: Auto-Retarget & Batch Export
items.description: Our upcoming pipeline tools will support automatic retargeting, multi-character export, and cloud-based motion library management.

modelAdvantages.title: Why HY-Motion: Model Advantages That Matter
modelAdvantages.description: HY-Motion 1.0 is built to generate realistic, controllable 3D human motion that works in real production environments — not just research demos.

items.title: Smooth & Natural Body Dynamics
items.description: The model produces realistic timing, weight shift, and body balance, reducing artifacts like foot sliding or jittery movement.

items.title: Supports Complex & Multi-Step Actions
items.description: Describe chained actions — such as running, jumping, turning, or interacting — and the model generates continuous motion sequences.

items.title: English & Chinese Prompt Understanding
items.description: Trained on bilingual motion instructions, the model works reliably with natural language prompts in both English and Chinese.

items.title: Fast Generation With Two Model Tiers
items.description: Choose between the Lite (Fast) model for quick iteration or the Full (Quality) model when you need higher motion detail and fidelity.

items.title: Built for Developers & Creators
items.description: Designed for animation, games, virtual characters, research, and prototyping — not limited to academic or synthetic motion datasets.

items.question: What formats can I download the animations in?
items.answer: You can download generated motions in FBX, BVH, and GLTF formats. These files are compatible with Blender, Unity, Unreal Engine, and most professional 3D tools.

items.question: Can I use the motions in commercial projects?
items.answer: Yes. Motions generated on our platform can be used in games, films, research, and commercial productions, subject to the model’s open-source license and platform terms.

items.question: Does HY-Motion support facial expressions or hand animation?
items.answer: HY-Motion 1.0 focuses on full-body skeletal motion. It currently does not generate detailed facial animation or fine-grained finger movement.

items.question: Will the animations work with my custom character rig?
items.answer: Yes. Motions are generated on a neutral skeleton that can be retargeted to custom rigs. Upcoming Pro features will include automatic retargeting support.

items.question: Do I need credits to generate animations?
items.answer: Each motion generation consumes credits. Free users receive a limited amount of credits, and additional credits can be unlocked by upgrading to a paid plan.

items.question: Is there a difference between the Lite and Full models?
items.answer: Yes. The Lite model prioritizes speed and is ideal for quick previews, while the Full model delivers higher-quality motion with more detail and realism.

creditsUpsell.title: Running Out of Credits?
creditsUpsell.description: Keep creating without interruptions. Upgrade your plan or add more credits to continue generating high-quality motion animations.
